(Ok, first, I'd like to deal with this unfortunate stuff.  The screw 
ups.  Or mess ups.  Icdemon, "Brooder and Steel open fire on the 
Alliance" will not work.  You have to be more specific.  Next, 
Silverbolt and Stomper never went inside the Ark, so they can't fire 
on Punch nor Zergling.  And, another argument on that, in your post 
Archangel sealed the Ark BEFORE they got in.  Oops?

Alloran, is Ratchet able to fire weapons while in his elephant beast 
mode?)

(Also, RFA, do to a confusion in posts involving Serpentor and Shadow 
Wing's death, he may or may not have actually been able to go into 
the Ark (late posting may have interfered with that), so I won't post 
damage yet.  I suggest attacking another bot, and if Serpentor is in 
the battle, I'll post his damage and you may continue your 
illustrious battle for honor, ok?)

The Oblitercons/Unitron/BH/Blastrage/Zergling/Serpentor/Punch/Oinker:




Dark One side stepped, blasts scratching his left leg.

Hiss ducked, the shots missing him by inches.

"Form Oblitertron!" Dark One yelled, all the Oblitercons leaping into 
the air, a powerful magnetic pull slamming each of them together in 
odd shapes, a 45 foot high robot crashing to the ground, raising its 
arms int he air, yelling madly.

"OBLITERTRON SHALL OBLITERATE"

---

Unitron ignored Oblitertron, having seen plenty of gestalts in his 
days.  He barrel rolled, firing off a missile at the Ark.

---

Oinker fired off three laser blasts at Stomper.

---

BH brought the skimmer about at full speed, Blastrage swinging the 
grenade launcher, firing off three grenades, two heading at 
Silverbolt, the other at the Ark.

-------

Zergling got up after picking up his rapid-firing laser rifle, firing 
off 10 rapid laser bolts at Xiane's back.  

---

Punch yelped, raising his hands as his plasma cannon crashed to the 
ground, in two pieces.
